# пример 1

**циклический сдвиг вправо**

```asm
//J B WS ALUOp RA1 RA2 Offset WA
  0 0 00 00000 00000 00000 00101000 00001  ; reg[1] = a 
  0 0 10 00000 00000 00000 00000000 00010  ; reg[2] = sw_i
  0 0 00 00000 00000 00000 00011111 00011  ; reg[3] = 1F (маска)
  0 0 01 00111 00010 00011 00000000 00101  ; reg[5] = reg[2] & reg[3] (sw_i & 1F)
  0 0 00 00000 00000 00000 00000001 00110  ; reg[6] = 1
  0 0 01 00001 00110 00101 00000000 00110  ; reg[6] = reg[6] << reg[5] (1 << (sw_i & 1F))
  0 0 00 00000 00000 00000 00000001 00111  ; reg[7] = 1
  0 0 01 01000 00110 00111 00000000 00111  ; reg[7] = reg[6] - reg[7] ((1 << (sw_i & 1F)) - 1)
  0 0 01 00111 00001 00111 00000000 00100  ; reg[4] = reg[1] & reg[7] 
  0 0 01 00101 00001 00101 00000000 01000  ; reg[8] = reg[1] >> reg[5] (a >> (sw_i & 1F))
  0 0 00 00000 00000 00000 00100000 01001  ; reg[9] = 32
  0 0 01 01000 01001 00101 00000000 01010  ; reg[10] = reg[9] - reg[5] (32 - (sw_i & 1F))
  0 0 01 00001 00100 01010 00000000 01011  ; reg[11] = reg[4] << reg[10] 
  0 0 01 00110 01000 01011 00000000 01100  ; reg[12] = reg[8] | reg[11] 
  1 0 00 00000 01100 00000 00000000 00000  ; out_o = reg[12]
```
